title: How do I disable the key press sound?
answer:
1、The key press sound is related to the input method. In the specific input method menu,you can disable the key press sound. For example:
Touch > Settings > Language & keyboard > TouchPal Input, clear the Key press sound check box and then you have disabled the key press sound successfully.
2、Disabling the key press sound does not affect the incoming call ringtone and text message ringtone.
